title: Agu Dun Ba De Gushi
synopsis: There is an ordinary small village in the Shannan area of the snow-covered plateau. The villagers have been living ordinary lives for generations, step by step, landlords collecting rent, farmers farming, herders grazing, and groceries walking streets and alleys. There is also a small village at the entrance of the village. teahouse. Suddenly one day, a wandering man-Agutumba, came from nowhere, and broke the peaceful life of the villagers, and the story began here. Agutonba usually seems to be idle, but in fact he is a very smart person. Usually solve all kinds of troubles for the people in the village, humorous, full of sense of justice, and bring a lot of fun to everyone's life. Gradually, Agutunba was trusted by the villagers, and the relationship between the people in the village became more and more friendly. However, behind this joy, a shadow quietly focused on Agutunba... (translated from iqiyi)
